snippet: An Army wife, after years of objections, agrees to her husband’s wish to be deployed to Afghanistan.
abstract: Jenny Williams Modern Love column shares her experience of being an Army wife, speculating on whether her children would forgive either her or her husband if he does not return from Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: An Army wife, after years of objections, agrees to her husband’s wish to be deployed to Afghanistan.

headline.seo: A Surrender, After an Uneasy Peace – Modern Love
headline.main: A Surrender to War, After an Uneasy Peace
headline.print_headline: A Surrender to War, After an Uneasy Peace

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
